DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: Nuclear waste -- A story on nuclear waste in Friday ' s editions of The Times inaccurately reported the half-life of plutonium.The correct number is 24 # 119 years . Half-life is the time in which a radioactive substance loses half its radioactivity . Generally , such a substance remains radioactive for at least 10 times its half-life .
